about_desc: Hello there, my name is Hrutugandha Nishigandh. Aspiring web developer with the ability to communicate effectively in a team setting. Have done several projects involving frontend and backend development. Highly organized, multi-tasker with expertise in scheduling projects, enhancing designs, and verifying code. Have successfully developed elegant, groundbreaking clones of websites. Seeking to further improve tech skills with a challenging role as a future software developer at a growth-oriented organization. I mainly develop MERN stack apps, i'm open to new opportunities.
